Accepted: IEEE Trans. Cognitive and Developmental Systems

12 Dec 2019

Prof. Lin Wang and Prof. Jeff Orchard have had their work on evolving neural learning rules accepted in the journal IEEE Transactions on Cognitive and Developmental Systems. Check out the PDF.
